Title: Episode #1.1
Writer: Chris Chibnall (created and written by), Chris Chibnall (creator)
Actors: Oskar McNamara, Jodie Whittaker, Andrew Buchan, Charlotte Beaumont
Plot: Detective Ellie Miller returns from holiday to find that her promotion to inspector was given to an outsider, named Alec Hardy, and that the son of her close friend has supposedly committed suicide.
